segments.text: Yes . I'd like to send this parcel to Changchun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you want to send it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess I'll send it by airmail .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , there are only some vases .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are fragile articles . They must be packed in a proper strong box . Your light cardboard box won't do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you got boxes for sale ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it all right this time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Now fill in two customs declarations and one despatch note in English . You'll have to take your parcel to the next window for examination when you have completed the forms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you written down your return address ?
segments.speaker: S1
